name: Synaptic Terror
flavor: You project a terrifying image into the brains of your foes, and their fear psionically invigorates your allies.
target: Each ally and enemy in the area

metadata.flavor: You project a terrifying image into the brains of your foes, and their fear psionically invigorates your allies.
metadata.target: Each ally and enemy in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You and each target ally can't obtain lower than a tier 2 outcome on power rolls until the start of your next turn. Each target enemy is affected by the ability's power roll.

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: You can't use this ability if doing so would cause you to have negative clarity.
